actionUnits.condition: Directly invoke HouseController.changeLights() on MonoBehaviour component (script guid: 340adb04e4e259e4b9c3e716ea2e6ced, component fileID: 821553098848002451). Expected behavior: iterate windowGlassObjects, set each Renderer.material _EmissionColor to lightsOnEmissionColor when currentLightStatus==true, otherwise lightsOffEmissionColor, and enable _EMISSION keyword.
